thread.title: 'The clock is ticking', EU tells Brexit Britain

title: 'The clock is ticking', EU tells Brexit Britain
text:
'The clock is ticking', EU tells Brexit Britain 9:09pm IST - 01:56
As European Affairs ministers discuss the EU's future relationship with Britain, Britain faces warnings that next month's EU summit is the 'ultimate deadline' for progress on issues related to Northern Ireland's border. As Kate King reports, a deepening row in the UK government over EU customs arrangements could make any progress hard to achieve. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
As European Affairs ministers discuss the EU's future relationship with Britain, Britain faces warnings that next month's EU summit is the 'ultimate deadline' for progress on issues related to Northern Ireland's border. As Kate King reports, a deepening row in the UK government over EU customs arrangements could make any progress hard to achieve.
